description:
The "GPS for iPhones" app is an iPhone-based solution that allows you to track the location of other people. The app combines the robust GPS functionality of the iPhone and real-time internet mapping. 

Features include:
► Locate other iPhone users and view their movements during the previous 24 hours.
► Permission based system allows/denies other iPhone users to follow you.
► Instant blocking of individual(s) to know your location.
► Simple registration process.

Uses include:
► Follow kids movements throughout the day.
► Know where family members are at any time.
► Track employees movement during work hours.
► Locate friends.
► Find lost or stolen phones.

Other items:
► To follow another person, they must use the "GPS for iPhones" to grant you permission.
► Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
► IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, PLEASE EMAIL US AT: "HELP @ iPHONE-TRACKER.NET"
releaseNotes: We help millions of people track each other every day! Thanks for all your feedback.  We hope you like the new features!
